entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning with 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this afternoon except southwest 30 near Juan de Fuca Strait. High 15. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h except southwest 30 near Juan de Fuca Strait this evening. Wind becoming light late this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 30%
